attributes.action: Enforce the law against cyclists riding on the pavement and in public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Educate cyclists on TV to the fact that it is illegal under the Road Traffic Act to ride a bike on the pavement. Also to stop the police from ignoring this practice and riding a bike without lights. Also stop councils encouraging this practice to aid their traffic reduction schemes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
